text: Edward Thomas Beatty (July 6, 1937 - June 13, 2021) was an American actor. He was born in Louisville, Kentucky. He was known for his film work including Nashville (1975), All the President's Men (1976), Network (1976), The Big Easy (1987) and Prelude to a Kiss (1992). Beatty died of natural causes on June 13, 2021 in Los Angeles, California, aged 83. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1937 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Actors from Louisville, Kentucky Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Drama Desk Award winners
title: Ned Beatty
